Puzzle.text: You take a step forward and you hear a loud creaking sound. What do you do?

choices.1: Drop a boulder where you stepped.
choices.2: Quickly jump out of the way.

Puzzle.failed: You fell into a pit a lost 20 hit points.
Puzzle.completed: The rock opened a trap door and you are safe.

Puzzle.text: You step into this room and a stone door closes behind you. On the door, you find this inscription: 'I weaken all men for hours each day. I show you strange visions while you are away. I take you by night, by day take you back, None suffer to have me, but do from my lack.'
Puzzle.failed: The room fills with gas and you lose 20 hit points.
Puzzle.completed: You see the door slowly rise and you are free to exit.

Puzzle.text: You hear a click and something speeding through the air. What do you do?

choices.1: Jump as high as you can.
choices.3: Press yourself up against the wall.

Puzzle.failed: You are hit with a poison dart. You lose 20 hit points.
Puzzle.completed: Poison darts fly over your body. You are safe...for now.
